subtitle: Thinking Allowed
Conversations on the leading edge of knowledge and discovery with psychologist Jeffrey Mishlove
Hello and welcome. I’m Jeffrey Mishlove.
The main reason for today’s “In Presence” monologue is to inform you that this coming
Sunday the 17th of
May [2020] I will be doing a live stream here.
That means – here on YouTube –
that means that you will have an opportunity to pose your questions to me directly. The theme
for this live stream is going to be answering the tough questions.
Some of you ask really difficult, challenging questions,
like, why am I deleting your particular comments in the comment section or
why do I keep featuring a person like Jason Reza Jorjani with his
alt-right connections, and his unsavory political
affiliations, or at least previous political affiliations. Or questions
about race. Questions about religion.
Whatever difficult questions you
want to throw at me, I plan to address them then.
One of the questions that comes up, for example, is, “How come you just don’t demonstrate
psychokinesis or remote viewing, for example, on the channel?” “Why is it that all you do is talk about it?
Why can’t we see it? Where’s the proof?”
So, I plan to use Sunday’s live stream as an opportunity to address those questions. I’ll talk,
myself, for 15 or 20 minutes and then I’m going to throw
open the discussion to questions that come from viewers. I know we have viewers all over the world.
The live stream will occur at 2pm, that’s USA mountain time. So,
wherever you live you’ll have to
calculate what 2pm USA Mountain Time – here in Albuquerque, New Mexico – what that means for you.
For now, I
also want to talk about how grateful I am for all of the support
that we have received from our volunteers. There are over
300 volunteers now - or actually to be precise just about 300 – I think it's 290
The volunteers have been doing wonderful work. If you go to see InPresence
0001, the very first “In Presence” monologue that I did, you’ll see that we’ve already posted edited
transcripts in six different languages, as well English.
We hope to do that through for the whole “In Presence” series, and for many of the other interviews.
Eventually, it would be great to do them for all. We have a team of dozens of people
editing and transcribing and translating interviews.
One of the reasons I’m doing this monologue now is to tell you we could use even more help to get through
the hundreds of interviews that we have and the
dozens of languages into which they’re being translated. The thing is this: I want them to be accurate.
In order to ensure accuracy,
it’s necessary – or at least helpful - for the translators to have another person familiar with each language,
double-checking their work. In some languages,
we don’t – we only have one person –
Swahili, or Finnish, or Swedish, or Czech, or Hindi, or Gujarati, Indonesian, Dutch,
Catalan, Malay, Chinese. A few others – Arabic, Persian, for example. Turkish. So, I am asking
for other people who are willing – who believe in this work, who believe in the project of
self-awareness, and spiritual awakening in which we’re engaged, and want to be
deep in their own relationship with the New Thinking Allowed channel. I welcome more
translators, and more volunteers for other things.
Volunteers have been coming to me with suggestions for things that never had occurred to me before.
We hope that, with their help, we’re going to be able to
accomplish things that we hadn’t even dreamed of. A searchable database
that you just put in any search term that’s of interest to you – tantra, or poltergeists – and
you will find hot links that will take you to the very spot in each of our videos where these
terms are being described and discussed. That’s a project.
We’re in the process now – a group of volunteers came to me and said you can reach a bigger audience.
You can reach young people. You can reach people who don’t normally listen to your interviews. And I love their
energy so I said I’d be happy to work with you. They’re coming up with very highly produced short videos,
based on these interviews, as trailers, as a way to get a
person excited about sitting down and listening to perhaps a 40-minute
conversation. So, we are expanding our reach. I think, given the
crisis that the world is going through now, the
only antidote that I see for ultimately the
concatenation of multiple crises that are facing the world, is for people to become more
self-aware, more mindful, more awake in a spiritual sense.
That’s the project in which we are engaged. I hear from many, many viewers that
they resonate with that. People tell me,
some people tell me that their lives are changed beyond words. So,
I really appreciate the help that the volunteers have been
giving us. I encourage more volunteers. We offer a weekly newsletter now for volunteers.
Eventually I hope to offer, and extend, a weekly newsletter to all viewers. But, for now,
it's just for volunteers. So, we’re looking for music composers. We’re looking for artists.
We’re looking for video editors. We’re looking for people who can help upgrade our website.
And for people who have ideas that we haven’t even thought of yet. Because
we’re in an expansion phase, right now.
While the rest of the global economy is shutting down, we’re hopefully
becoming more creative and more expansive. So,
to volunteer please send me an email.
I read them all when they go to friends@newthinkingallowed.com.
The reason an email is important is because we want your email
address for our newsletter, so that you get it. Just
replying in the comments section after the video – it’s nice,
and, if you do, I’ll tell you to send me an email so that we can get you officially
registered as a New Think Allowed teammate or volunteer.
So, once again, let me remind you to tune in for the live stream this coming Sunday, 2pm
USA Mountain Time.
That will be when I will be addressing the toughest questions that you can throw at me.
I look forward to interacting with you then.
Thank you for being with me.
